titles.title: RETIREES FIRST Act
Reducing Excessive Taxation and Inefficiencies by Reforming Elder Exemptions to Support Fairness, Inflation Relief, and Simpler Taxes Act
RETIREES FIRST Act
A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to increase the threshold amounts for inclusion of Social Security benefits in income, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.
